src:
Besni zaradi dogajanja v Kmetiji: »Kuhna«!  
Mnogi so prepričani, da bi se dvojčka včeraj morala posloviti od glavne nagrade.
02 Nov 2019, 13:16 by A. L.
V Kmetiji smo vajeni, da se od boja za glavno nagrado poslovi tisti, ki v boju izgubi. A včeraj ni bilo tako, zaradi česar nekateri Pop TV in ustvarjalcem šova očitajo – kuhinjo. Prepričani so, da se je zgodila krivica, seveda pa se najdejo tudi taki, ki proti dogajanju nimajo nič proti, saj gre vendar za igro. 
Izpostavljamo nekaj komentarjev gledalcev (v izvirni obliki)
Tanja piše: »Sej bi jih mogli diskvalificirati ker sta prejšnji dan kradla v trgovini, a to pa niso videli, je pa tako če izgubiš greš domov, če bi bilo obratno bi Danijel in Marjana šla domov, ona dva sta se pa zasmilila produkciji pa sta lahko ostala. Sama kuhinja POP TV.«Tatjana voditeljici očita nepoštenost: »Ampak ni bilo fer od voditeljice, da ju je pustila notri. Čeprav sta oz je en izrazu željo, da da mesto Boži. pa je rekla ne ... Jasno je, da bojo vsi člani glasovali za dvojčka.«»Ni pravično. Če je tekmovanje in izgubiš, moraš domov, takšna naj bi bila pravila,« je jasna Milena. Z njo se strinja tudi Andreja: »Njuna zgodba ni merilo, da ostaneta v igri čeprav sta izgubila dvoboj.«»Skoraj vsak od nas ima neko žalostno zgodbo o svojem življenju, vendar smo kljub temu spoštljivi do drugih in ne manipuliramo z njimi. Tele dva pa ...« opozarja Petra. »Ni pošteno, da včeraj nista šla ven kot vsi ostali. Sta izgubila in bi mogla zapusti kmetijo,« je neomajna Romana.Vanessi je včerajšnja oddaja potegnila živec: »Prava dva manipulatorja! Točno vesta kdaj je potrebno "pritisniti na pravo tipko" Spokajta raje domov ... itak ni nobene koristi od vaju na kmetiji in prepustita prostor tistim, ki si zaslužijo ostati in ki je od njih kaj koristi. Vidva pa terata tam sam luksuz, delat pa tak nič ne znata. Prav opazi se..da imata veze in poznanstva. Tut klobase sta maznila brez dovoljenja, pa nobenih sankcij. Nekdo drug bi verjetno že letel iz kmetije, vidva pa očitno imata potuho od nekoga.«»Vseeno bi mogla it včeraj ven, ne vem zakaj se dela razlika med tekmovalci,« meni Marjana.»Ja zaradi tega ne rabita biti tako mogočna, pa se hvalit kaj sta pa kak bosta tega pa onega vrgla iz kmetije, smo včeraj videli kaj sta, sam dolg jezik je njiju skupaj, glede včerajšne igre je bilo zelo nepošteno, Natalija je samo vprašala, kdo si želi da odide iz kmetije Boža. Marjana ni dvignila roke, za dvojčka sploh vprašala ni, kaj če bi vsi dvignili roko? A to se vam zdi pošteno????« se jezi Marko.Sreč pa se je oglasil: »To sploh ni kmetija, tile imajo tak luksus kot marsikateri hotel nima. Prejšne kmetije so bile bolj podobne kmetijam, to kar je zdaj pa ni za nikamur, tu si noben ne zasluži 50000 eur, vsaj do zdaj ne.To je kmetija taktiziranja ne pa dela.« Kljub vsemu, kar smo do zdaj videli, pa nekateri v tem, da so ju pustili na posestvu, ne vidijo težav.Klementina je stopila fantoma deloma v bran: »Igra je igra in večina komentatorjev tega ne razume. Pač sta dobila drugo priložnost in nista prva v tej kmetiji ... Že vedo zakaj so tako naredili. Bo vsaj še zanimivo jih gledati. Jaz se kar nasmejem, ko jih gledam, kdor se jezi, pa povem še enkrat, to je šov in ne resnično življenje ... In ne udrihajte po tistem, ki pove svojo težko zgodbo, saj sta s tem morda spustila del bremena, ki ju muči. Občutek imam, kot, da ste ljubosumni, ker vaša težka zgodba ni na tv.«
text:
Furious about Farmhouse happening: "Kitchen"!
Many believe the twins should say goodbye to the grand prize yesterday.
02 Nov 2019, 12:16 by A.L.
We at the Farm are accustomed to doing the job of losing the main prize from the fight for the top prize. But yesterday was not the case, which makes some Pop TV and the show creators blame - the kitchen. They are convinced that injustice has happened, but of course there are those who do not mind the action, because it is a game.
We highlight some viewer comments (in original format)
Tanja writes: “They could have been disqualified for the sessions because they had been stealing the store the other day, but they did not see it, so if you lose you go home, if it were the other way around, Danijel and Marjana would go home, and the two would laugh at the production. they could stay. The kitchen itself is POP TV. "Tatiana accuses the presenter of dishonesty:" But it was not fair for the presenter to let her in. Although oz is one expression of the desire to give the city of Christmas. but she said no ... It is clear that all members will vote for twins. "" Not fair. If it's a competition and you lose, you have to go home, that's how the rules should be, "Milena is clear. Andrei agrees with her: "Their story is not a measure of staying in the game even though they lost the duel." "Almost every one of us has a sad story about our lives, but we are nevertheless respectful of others and do not manipulate them. But these two ... "Petra warns. “It's not fair that they didn't go out like everyone else yesterday. They lost and could leave the farm, "Romana said unmistakably. To Vanessa, yesterday's show pulled a nerve:" Two manipulators right! You know exactly when to "press the right button". They prefer to go home ... anyway, there is no benefit to you on the farm and leave space to those who deserve to stay and who benefits from them. You guys are a luxury there, but they don't know anything about it. Observe .. they have relationships and acquaintances. They greased the sausages here without permission, but no sanctions. Someone else would probably be flying out of the farm, but you two obviously have a sneak peek from someone. "" You could go out yesterday anyway, I don't know why the difference is between the competitors, "Marjana says." Yeah, that's why you don't have to be so powerful, brag about what they are going to throw you from the farm yesterday, we saw yesterday what they are, the long tongue is together, yesterday's game was very unfair, Natalia just asked who wants to leave the farm Boža. Marjana didn't raise her hand, she didn't even ask the twins what if everyone raised their hand? But does that seem fair to you ???? "Marko was angry. Fortunately, he said," This is not a farm at all, these have such a luxury as many hotels do not have. Previous farms were more like farms, but what is now is nowhere for anyone, no one deserves 50000 euros, at least not so far. they see no problems in letting them in on the estate. Clementine stepped in to the phantom in part: "The game is a game and most commentators don't understand it. They just got a second chance and they're not the first ones in this farm ... They already know why they did it. It will be interesting to watch them at least. I just smile when I watch them, whoever is angry, but once again I tell you, this is a show and not a real life ... bothering her. I feel like you are jealous because your difficult story is not on tv. "
